qas.question: What is the official name for Guinea-Bissau?
How many square miles is Guinea-Bissau?
What is the estimated population of Guinea-Bissau?
How many kilometers does Guinea-Bissau cover?

context: Guinea-Bissau (i/ˈɡɪni bɪˈsaʊ/, GI-nee-bi-SOW), officially <a0_0>the Republic of Guinea-Bissau<a0_0/> (Portuguese: República da Guiné-Bissau, pronounced: [ʁeˈpublikɐ dɐ ɡiˈnɛ biˈsaw]), is a country in <a1_0>West Africa<a1_0/>. It covers <a4_0>36,125<a4_0/> square kilometres (<a2_0>13,948 sq mi<a2_0/>) with an estimated population of <a3_0>1,704,000<a3_0/>.
